name: Tipsy Tales
description:
tipsy has been trapped in a room full of monstors who are chasing after her to posion her, kill as many as you can and save her! 

Have Fun!

1.arrow keys or  WASD  to move

2.You have to collect power up which look like Bombs press right click to use them and explode  a lot of enemies together

3.Click to shoot
